title: Graung's Guide to Golarion: Ancestries of the Impossible Lands
description: Graung's Guide to Golarion: Ancestries of the Impossible Lands adds dozens of new ancestry feats and new heritages for Automatons, Dwarves, Geniekin, Ghorans, Kashrishi, Nagaji, Skeletons, Vanara, and Vishkanyas. It also includes two new ancestriesâ€”Girtablilu, the fearsome guardians of ruins and abandoned places and the cursed Ratajin, who seek to unravel the nature of the magic that has rewired their senses. Additionally, the Mana Wastes Mutant versatile heritage allows you to play as a creature who's body has been altered by the strange and warped magic of the Mana Wastes! Designed to work with Feats+!

packs.name: ancestries
